name: Pumpkins knock down
description:
Destroy all angry pumpkins by knocking them down using tomatoes, bombs, or by freeing the ultra-tomatoes.

The game has 15 unique levels (with many more to come) . Everything is controlled by physics, so you have to aim in order to win.

The bombs and the ultra-tomatoes can destroy various obstacles (and knock down the pumpkins) , bringing unique game-play for each try .

All levels are unlocked from the start, so if you have problems with a single level - you can jump to the next with just two clicks. Also, you can try to improve your own highscore per level.

Key features:

   - Easy to understand and addictive game-play
   - Includes Halloween-themed levels
   - Offline Mode: you can play the game (after downloading it) even without internet connection
   - Colorful design and nice sound effects
   -  Free game
   - Suitable of kids and adults
   - Aim, aim , aim in order to win !

Swing the Nice tomatoes , use gravity and activate the bombs to eliminate the  evil pumpkins in this free game.
